まいったなあ… こう部屋が暗くちゃあっ…
君の顔も見えやしない…
google_translated:
I'm sorry ... The room is dark ...
You can not see your face ...

en_text: Fake blood?
jp_text: え… 血ぶ くろ…？

en_text: Yumiko, one last kiss...
jp_text:
ああ～ 由美子… は…
別れのキスを… あうっあうっ…
google_translated:
Oh ~ Yumiko ... ...
A kiss of farewell ... I'm happy ...

en_text: The last kiss...
jp_text: 別れのキスを～…

en_text: Umibozu had no intention of\Nkilling you from the very start.
jp_text:
海坊主も君をやる気は
なかったのさ 始めっから…
google_translated:
I feel like I'm doing you
From the beginning of the first time ...

en_text: Fact is, he's a fan of yours.
jp_text:
実のところ 奴もファンなんだ
佐藤由美子のね
google_translated:
The guy is also a fan
Yumiko Sato

en_text: Well, it looks like I've done my job.
jp_text: さってと～ 俺の役目も終わったな

en_text: As long as you never forget how it\Nfelt to kill that ghost at least.
jp_text:
亡霊を打ち砕いた時の
心を忘れない限り… な
google_translated:
When you break the ghost
Unless you want to forget your mind ...

en_text: Thank you, Ryo.
jp_text: ありがとう リョウ…

en_text: If you ever feel like you want\Nto die again, call me.
jp_text: また 死にたくなったら呼んでくれ
google_translated: Call me if you want to die again

en_text: A job from a guy?!\NConsider that idea shot down!
jp_text:
やだもんね 男からの依頼なんて
僕いちぬけた！
google_translated:
A request from a man
I got up!

en_text: Don't say that!
jp_text: そう言うなって～！

en_text: He's doing it ALL for the\Nsake of little Michiko.
jp_text:
それもこれも み～んな
道子ちゃんの為なのだ…
google_translated:
That's also a lot
It's for Myo-chan ...

en_text: Oh, really? If that's the case, I may\Nhave to stage a little piece of drama.
jp_text:
は？ あ そう… あ そ～ゆうことなら
一芝居うっちゃお 僕～
google_translated:
teeth?Oh yeah ... ah ~ if it is
Ichiba I'm a good boy ~

en_text: My, my...
jp_text: あんた ロリコンだったんだ…

en_text: Big brother here will bring Daddy\Nback to you for sure.
jp_text:
お兄さんがきっと
パパを連れてきてあげるよ
google_translated:
My brother surely
I will bring my dad

en_text: Next: "A Gunshot to Set the Heart Aflutter!\NSad, Lonely Girl"
jp_text:
次回 「心ふるえる銃声
悲しきロンリーガール」

Next time "Malburu Gumble
Sad Lonely Girl "
